author: Arthur Pacaud (arthuro555)
description:
Allows getting the volume of the microphone.

- Request mic access (action)
- Mic access granted (condition)
- Mic access denied (condition)
- Get mic volume (expression)
name: Microphone
shortDescription: Integrates the microphone into your games, a request for get access to mic is required, an action is provided for that.

eventsFunctions.description: Requests an access to the microphone.
eventsFunctions.name: RequestMicrophoneAccess

eventsFunctions.description: Triggers once when the access to the microphone has been denied.
eventsFunctions.name: MicrophoneDenied

eventsFunctions.description: Triggers once when the access to the microphone has been granted.
eventsFunctions.name: MicrophoneGranted

eventsFunctions.description: Returns the microphone volume (how loud the sound is, 0 is silent to 1 is higher and louder).
eventsFunctions.name: Volume
